p:
Finally, the relevance of our work for other network types should be studied in the future. Besides the small-worldness, other topological properties as scale-freeness and degree correlation have been shown to play an important role for epidemic spreading
36, 37 and should therefore be taken into account. We expect that a similar mechanism to the one described here for the case of epidemics may also be relevant for the related problems of spreading on networks of other phenomena such as rumors and influences.
